title: Hothouse Orchid
description: Taking a sabbatical in the Florida town where she was once police chief, senior CIA officer Holly Barker remembers her unsuccessful charges against her former Army commanding officer who attempted to rape her. She even considers leaving her current position to challenge the man who is now Chief of the Orchid Beach Police Department.Another riveting episode in the life of Holly Barker by Stuart Woods, the best-selling author of "Iron Orchid."
author: Stuart Woods
